main.name: Nallasivan Govindasamy
main.description: Hi, I’m Nallasivan, passionate to learn the latest trending technologies. I have a very strong experience in .NET Framework and SQL Server.
main.bio: Hi, I’m Nallasivan, passionate to learn the latest trending technologies. I have 16 years of very strong experience in .NET Framework and SQL Server. In the 16 years 7 years as a Technical Architect cum Lead Developer and 2 years as a Solutions Architect in multi domain, multi - platform, multiple technologies.Though I am a ASP.NET(C#) / SQL guy, I coded almost everything except Mainframe( ** * At least created a page).Few of those are Java, ColdFusion, Php, JSP, MySQL, BizTalk 2004, HIPAA EDI, Identity and Access Management, FIM 2010 R2, Active Directory, PowerShell etc.The current trending technologies made me crazy and I learnt and coded the JS frameworks like ReactJS, NodeJS, BackboneJs, Redux, ExpressJS etc...I love to work on the DLT(Distributed Ledger Technology), I did few works on this using DAML.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me at,

testimonials.text: Nalla - it was lovely to work with you. You always showed such enthusiasm and dedication to the projects we worked on together. I will miss your innovative suggestions but wish you all the best - am sure you will be an asset in your next role
testimonials.user: Carolyn Legge - Head of Digital Transformation Australia and New Zealand, BNP PARIBAS

testimonials.text: Nalla is technically strong and has displayed exceptional business understanding of his subject area. He approaches the problems in a very structured way. </br> He is also compassionate and always looks towards helping others and sharing knowledge.And most importantly there is a great positivity in his style of working and communication. I was fortunate to have him in my team. My best wishes Nalla!
testimonials.user: Rosalin Behera - Senior Manager, Accenture, Finland

testimonials.text: Nallasivan had been an excellent co worker, who helped us develop the software for our in-house claims processing. He is very reliable and consistent, with in depth knowledge of the subject.
testimonials.user: Dr Richa Jaiswal - Insurance Consulting - Deloitte UK
